#############
Aldryn People
#############


Aldryn People is an `Aldryn <http://aldryn.com>`_-compatible jobs application for for `django CMS
<http://django-cms.org>`_.

Aldryn People allows you to manage and publish lists and groups of people, such as members of
staff, on your django CMS website.

Aldryn People supports the `vCard format <http://www.w3.org/TR/vcard-rdf/>`_.

Aldryn People is `open-source software <https://github.com/aldryn/aldryn-people>`_.
